subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Roberto Ferrari of Italy sprinted to his first Grand Tour stage victory in the 11th leg of the Giro d’Italia, while Joaquín Rodríguez of Spain retained the overall lead by 17 seconds.
snippet: Roberto Ferrari of Italy sprinted to his first Grand Tour stage victory in the 11th leg of the Giro d’Italia, while Joaquín Rodríguez of Spain retained the overall lead by 17 seconds.
